Class Daemon

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Daemon
extends Core

    A simple HTTP server for servlets and server-pages in JavaScript.

    Since:
    Descripter 1.0
    Author:
    J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.descripter.org

      • print

        public void print(Script<?> script,
         java.lang.Object... args)

        A native global service for HTTP Response output.

        This method prints the elements of args to HTTP Response in HTML lines.

        Overrides:
        print in class Core
        Parameters:
        script - The script context that invoked this function
        args - An array of the arguments passed by the invocation
        Since:
        Descripter 1.0
        See Also:
        Core._print, Global.globalize(String)
